data.message: Have been on the website. Can't find any dates that r near to bromley or croydon. They r all in the heart of London.  Which we can't get to. My daughter is autistic and my nephew is aspergus. Which makes it even harder to get on a train to see it. Will it be driving through any location closer to us. So we could see it pleasw.  Thanks. X

replies.message: Hey Michelle, unfortunately London is your closet Christmas Truck Tour stop. Hopefully we see you there :) #holidaysarecoming
Not going anywhere near BRIGHTON either :( ...
